src:
;
; Grammar of the Python language
; transcribed from nick siegler's diagram:
; flickr.com/photos/nicksieger/281055485
;

file input -> stmt
stmt -> compound stmt
stmt -> simple stmt
simple stmt -> small stmt
small stmt -> del
del -> exprlist
small stmt -> exec
small stmt -> expr
expr -> augassign
expr -> testlist
small stmt -> flow
flow -> return
flow -> yield
flow -> continue
flow -> break
flow -> raise
raise -> test

small stmt -> pass
small stmt -> print
small stmt -> global
small stmt -> assert
assert -> test
small stmt -> import
import -> import as
import -> dotted as
dotted as -> dotted name
import -> dotted name

test -> lambdef
lambdef -> test
lambdef -> varargslist
varargslist -> defparameter
defparameter -> test
defparameter -> fpdef
fpdef -> fplist
fplist -> fpdef

exec -> expression
expression -> xor
xor -> and
and->shift
shift -> arith
arith -> term
term -> factor
factor -> power
power -> factor
power -> atom
power -> trailer
trailer -> subscriptlist
subscriptlist -> subscript
subscript -> sliceop
sliceop -> test
trailer -> arglist
arglist -> argument
argument -> test
arglist -> test
atom -> listmaker
listmaker -> list for
list for -> exprlist
list for -> list iter
list iter -> list for
list iter -> list if
list if -> list iter
list if -> test
atom -> dictmaker
dictmaker -> test
exec -> test

compound stmt -> for
for -> suite
for -> testlist
for -> exprlist
compound stmt -> classdef
classdef -> suite
classdef -> testlist
compound stmt -> try
try -> suite
try -> except
compound stmt -> if
if -> suite
if -> test
compound stmt -> while
while -> suite
while -> test
compound stmt -> funcdef
funcdef -> suite
funcdef -> parameters
parameters -> vararglist
title: Python Grammar
